content: Island in Singapore **Pulau Sarimbun** (previously also spelled **Pulau Serimbun** or **Pulau Srimbun**) is a small island situated in the [Straits of Johor](/wiki/Straits_of_Johor), off the north-western coast of Singapore. Located within Singapore waters, it has an area of 1.4 hectares. [William Arthur Bates Goodall](/wiki/W._A._B._Goodall) was a regular visitor in the 1920s and subsequently lived there permanently in the 1930s until his death in 1941. This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Pulau Sarimbun
